text:
Candidate N o.:  61307  
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS   
                                         
Location:    UK 
 
 
CAREER SUMMARY  
 
Feb 2020 – May 2020 Most Recent Company  
Tech start up focusing on OT cyber security . 
Position: Sales Director UK&I  
Joined the company to take over responsibility for manager large accounts in the UK & Ireland territory. He 
underwent significant detailed training in IT -OT security and customer strategy etc. with commendations by 
Management. Shortly after he joined, the compa ny was acquired by a Fortune 500  company  and they announced 
a series of redundancies across the field sales team in EMEA and unfortunately,  he was a victim of this redundancy.  
 
2016 – 2020  Previous Company   
Leaders in cloud security solutions.  
Position: Regional Sal  
  
Candidate N o.:  61307  
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS   
                                         
Location:    UK 
 
 
CAREER SUMMARY  
 
Feb 2020 – May 2020 Most Recent Company  
Tech start up focusing on OT cyber security . 
Position: Sales Director UK&I  
Joined the company to take over responsibility for manager large accounts in the UK & Ireland territory. He 
underwent significant detailed training in IT -OT security and customer strategy etc. with commendations by 
Management. Shortly after he joined, the compa ny was acquired by a Fortune 500  company  and they announced 
a series of redundancies across the field sales team in EMEA and unfortunately,  he was a victim of this redundancy.  
 
2016 – 2020  Previous Company   
Leaders in cloud security solutions.  
Position: Regional Sales Manager UK&I, Large Enterprise  
His r ole was ‘Direct Touch’ and focuse d on selling into ‘new logo’ large enterprise (10,000 -65,000 users) named 
accounts. Then managing and upselling to existing accounts (UK&I based headquarters but accounts most 
accounts are global).  
 
The company operates a 100% channel model, working mainly with the largest Internet Service Providers and 
Managed Security Services Partners including Verizon, BT, AT&T, Vodafone, T -Systems and VARs including 
Computacenter, Atos etc.  
 
Success was achieved by directly targeting and eng aging end -users. Developing strong relationships with key end -
user stakeholders at all levels. Also, working jointly with partners to build transformation propositions that include 
the company’s  cloud -based security solutions.  
 
Key Achievements:  
• FY2019   177%  
• FY2018   238%  
 
Key Awards include:  
• RSM UK&I Award for Q1 FY17 (Aug -Oct) Building Pipeline  
• EMEA RSM Award for Q1 FY18 (Aug -Oct) 310% achievement  
• EMEA Gold Standard Award Winner 2018 (plus 7,500 RSUs issued for outstanding contribut ions)  
• Global RSM of the QTR for Q4 FY19 (May -July) 257% achievement  
• EMEA RSM for FY19 177% achievement  
 
Significant wins include:  
Global Oil & Gas    $6.5M, 65,000 -100,000 users, 3 years  
Global Utility     $1M, 15,000 users (UK), 3 years  
Global Engineering  Services   $1.5M, 14,500 users, 3 years  
Global Tobacco Manufacturer   $1.5M, 41,000 users, 3 year  
Global Food & Beverages   $450K, 25,000 users, 1 year  
 Publishing & Information Services  $690K, 8,500 users, 3 years  
Leading Construction    $650K 15,000 users, 3  years  
UK Utility     $154K, 6,000 users, 1 year  
Global Designer Retail    $630K, 10,000 users, 3 years  
 
2013 – 2016 Arbor Networks  
Position: Enterprise Sales Manager UK&I  
New role to build and develop pipeline for Arbor’s Enterprise product range (new), and build/re -build channel 
relationships – Arbor has changed from a direct -sales model to 100% channel organisation (for fulfilment). Direct 
selling involvement in 100% of d eals.  
 
Very successfully built strong, proactive relationships with key UK&I security partners including BT, NTT Com 
Security (Integralis), SecureData, Nebulas, Phoenix, Agile Networks, Brookcourt  and have contacts in many more. 
He built a very healthy new  business Enterprise pipeline with large enterprises in banking, finance, insurance, 
pharmaceutical and e -commerce.  
 
Significant Enterprise wins included:  
VISA Europe    $1M  EBRD     $190K  
Prudential (PGDS)   $430K   Trader Media    $260K  
Booking.Com (Pricelin e)  $330K   Rightmove    $120K  
Bank of America   $310K   Colt (internal)    $300K  
GSK     $285K   Baillie Gifford    $120K  
Foreign & Commonwealth  $100K  
 
2011 – 2013 HP – ESS  
Position: Client Engagement Director (New Logo Business & Major Accounts)  
 
Highlights New Logo Wins:  
Tier-1 mobile provider    $3M Support plus $1M+ incremental new business  
Finance payment processor   $1M Phase 1 Technology & Services IDS Project  
Leading foreign exchange   $1M+ business taking over a ‘Red -Flag’ account  
Vodafone Ac count Manager (prior to leaving I was asked to manage Vodafone – KEY Global HP account)    
 
Feb 2010 – Mar 2011 I nfoblox  
Position: Major Account Manager  
Significant wins included Global Telecoms $250K, Global travel e -commerce $300K

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
